decision_conditions: The submitted arboricultural report part pursuant to condition 6 (a) (Tree Monitoring Program) of planning permission ref: 231407HH dated 28/06/2023 for 'Single storey detached garden outbuilding' are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies G5 and G7 of the London Plan (2021), policy 5.10 of Ealing's Development Management DPD and Ealing's SPG 9 - Trees and Development Guidelines.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of a arboricultural report in part pursuant to condition 6(a) of planning permission ref: 231407HH  dated 28/06/2023  for 'Single storey detached garden outbuilding'
